text: Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga, moshi anata to issho ni natte michibiki ni shitagaunaraba, watashi-tachi wa kono tochi kara owa reru koto ni narou.' Ware wa, kare-ra no tame ni anzen'na seiiki o mōke, ware kara no kate to shite subete no kajitsu o soko ni atsumetade wanai ka. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa sore ga wakaranai
